subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: A victory would have clinched the Brewers at least a tie in the wild-card race. Instead, they are tied with the Mets at 89-72 heading into the last day of the regular season Sunday.
snippet: A victory would have clinched the Brewers at least a tie in the wild-card race. Instead, they are tied with the Mets at 89-72 heading into the last day of the regular season Sunday.
